extendedInfo.description: BETA : Suggestion are welcome : Press 'read more' to see more detail below.PLUS Toll Rate is a calculator and some other features for all Malaysian user that allow you to calculate the PLUS Highway Toll rate within Malaysia, know how much you need to pay for traveling using Projek Lebuhraya Utara Selatan (PLUS)Recent Changes in 2.4.0 : 50+ alternative traffic cams added | Shortcut for Traffic to homescreen | Facilities | UI and some many other changes | (See changelog for more info)Instead of rating 1 or 2 star,please email to support@evozi.com or leave a comment so that we can fix or improve it.Features :â¢ PLUS Toll Rate calculatorâ¢ Offline toll rate that allow you to use anywhere, anytimeâ¢ Latest PLUS Expressways news and announcementsâ¢ Vehicles information and classesâ¢ LIVE PLUS Traffic Updatesâ¢ LIVE Traffic Cameraâ¢ Highway facilities [NEW]â¢ Share Traffic Status to Social Networkâ¢ App2SDâ¢ No annoying ads and push notification adsâ¢ Shortcut to Traffic Cams and Status [NEW]â¢ and more ! coming soon!Languages :* English* Bahasa Malaysia * Chinese(Email us if you would like to help to translate it)Links :Facebook : http://facebook.com/evozi/Beta Testing Group : https://www.facebook.com/groups/evozi/NOTICE :Leaving comments such as âDoesn't work.â and rating 1 star surely won't get you any help. Kindly contacting us directly is proven to give much better results, and higher levels of satisfaction for everybody. :)Please write an email if you have any problems, questions or feature requests. We can not answer on comments in the market.Due to the vast amount of android devices it might not work perfectly on everyone's device, but we are working hard to get it there. If you have problems on your device contact support@evozi.com and we will try to fix your problem in the next version.Keywords: evozi , PLUS , toll rate , malaysia , calculator , road , highway , singapore , traffic cam , traffic updates , traffic image , transport , speed cam , checkerâ¢ AKLEHâ¢ ELITEâ¢ Federal Route 2â¢ GCEâ¢ KESASâ¢ LDPâ¢ LKSAâ¢ LPTâ¢ NKVEâ¢ NPE â¢ PLUS - Northâ¢ PLUS - South â¢ PNB â¢ SHAPADU â¢ SILKâ¢ SMARTâ¢ SPRINT

reviews.title: Accurate
reviews.comment: It is better if developer can make radio option more easier to pick. 1st choose state, then choose enter/exit junction.   This app will be more superb if it able to count non PLUS highway too
reviews.author: ariffaizal mohd nor ariffin

reviews.title: User
reviews.comment: So good for travelers, maybe link it with a map, likes a Google map for example and GPS tracking for smartphone.More user friendly. Thank you for this app, it help me a lot.
reviews.author: ahmad faizi

reviews.title: Excellent
reviews.comment: I would like to see the traffic condition at second link Malaysia check point for both direction as there will be traffic jam during the public holiday and every Saturday. This additional cameras will definitely help the user to plan their journey.

reviews.title: Useful
reviews.comment: Informative and offline mode makes it convenient to estimate the toll cost for highway journeys. Can improve on the camera resolution to check on traffic conditions though.
